title: Biological Qubits Atlas (v1.2)
description: A curated atlas of quantum systems operating in, or compatible with, biological environments (in vitro, in cellulo, in vivo). Includes structured CSV (33 columns), linter, QC report, and a web UI. This dataset covers 22 systems across 4 classes: biological intrinsic (proteins), bio-compatible internalized (NV nanodiamonds, SiC), hyperpolarized nuclear spins (NMR), and mechanistic candidates (magnetoreception).
notes: Version 1.2 includes complete provenance (Source_T2/T1/Contraste), quantified uncertainties, biological flags (Hyperpol_flag, Cytotox_flag, Temp_controlled), and automated quality control (qubits_linter.py). 22 systems, 14 verified entries (64%), 0 blocking errors.
